text: I had an amazing experience with Dr. Harold Ma and his team for my hair transplant. From the very first consultation, Dr. Ma was professional, knowledgeable, and patient in answering all my questions. The procedure was smooth and comfortable, and the post-op care was excellent. Now, several months later, the results speak for themselves — my hair looks fuller and completely natural. I’m extremely happy with the outcome and grateful for Dr. Ma’s expertise. Highly recommend him to anyone considering a hair transplant!

Dr Harold is a fine craftsman of hair transplants giving genuinely splendid results. He has a seasoned team of assistants who has obviously done a great many hair transplants that they are able to give the patient a smooth and seamless experience during the entire procedure. The staff is personable treating clients with patience and warmth. If you are unsure of hair transplantation, I'd recommend you come to Freia Medical first and you won't be disappointed.

I was very impressed with my hair transplant done at Freia about a year ago. Dr Ma and his team is indeed very professional and meticulous in the process of transplanting my hair and I’m happy and satisfied with the end result. I would definitely recommend my peers or relatives to consult Dr Ma and his team if they’re also keen to get a transplant.

I recently had a hair implant with Dr. Ma, and the experience was outstanding. From the initial consultation to post-procedure care, he was patient, caring, and highly professional. He took the time to explain everything in detail, ensuring I felt comfortable and well-informed.

During the procedure, Dr. Ma’s expertise and precision were evident, making the process smooth and stress-free. His team was also incredibly supportive, creating a welcoming environment. What truly impressed me was his dedication to patient care, with thorough follow-ups to monitor my progress.

Now, a few months later, the results are amazing—my hair looks natural, fuller, and healthier than I ever expected. The transformation has boosted my confidence immensely.

If you’re considering a hair implant, I highly recommend Dr. Ma. His skill, professionalism, and genuine care make him the best choice for achieving great results!

Thank you Dr. Ma and team

Alex Tan

Dr Ma and his team do fantastic work. 9 months after my transplant and I could not be happier with the results. Aside from the results their care and attention are superb - they really look after you. You can’t go wrong with the team at Freia!
